title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Fern Floral", 1800–1818
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
dimensions:
Sheet: 18 x 22 cm (7 1/16 x 8 11/16 in)
Image: 16 x 20.3 cm (6 5/16 in x 8 in)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Four green ferns, four red flowers, four blue and white flowers against black background with small brown triangles and ferns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Fern Floral", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-28.
